abstract.para: Description of a Medulla 2 client folder

section.title: Overall organization
section.para: A Medulla 2 client folder contains information of two kind :

section.title: COPYNUM
section.para: Contains the ID of the next image.

section.title: exclude
section.para: The Medulla 2 backup binaries use this file to learn which partitions to backup (more precisely, which to exclude). This one contains exclusion patterns, one per line, using the following syntax : <disk name>:<partition name> :

listitem.para: To prevent backuping the P partition from D disk : D:P
To prevent backuping the D disk : D:0

section.title: header.lst
section.para: This INI-like config file describe which items will be displayed by the client.

section.title: [header] section
section.para: The section contains global items to pass to grub, using format "item=<grub directive>". For exemple :
(DEFNUM has a special meaning, see below).

section.title: [menuX] section
section.para: The section contains menu entries to pass to grub, using 4 mandatory keywords :

listitem.para: def (yes/no) : is this item the default one ?
include : this item configuration file path

section.title: header.lst.wol
section.para: Same as header.lst; used when system is supposed to be in WOL phase.
